name: chatwoot_hybrid_auto
description: Full automated hybrid Chatwoot deployment using Render + Supabase + Railway

tools.name: chatwootDeployer
tools.description: Deploys Chatwoot using hybrid architecture (Render + Supabase + Railway). Automatically creates Redis on Railway, configures Supabase database, generates render.yaml, and pushes to GitHub.

supabase_key.description: Supabase service role key (for database operations)

supabase_url.description: Supabase database connection URL (PostgreSQL connection string)

railway_token.description: Railway API token (for Redis/Valkey service creation)

frontend_url.description: Frontend URL where Chatwoot will be accessible (e.g., https://chatwoot.example.com)
